channel.title: How to add a bank
channel.description:
How do I add a bank to the home of my 317?
What i mean is what file do I add it into because i know autospawn.cfg is for npc's only sooo please help?

item.title: How to add a bank
item.dc:creator: @teufel teufel
item.description:
@teufel wrote:

Thank you i found this in my client file but i didn’t know which was cords and which was the id
Edit* How do I change the name of the bank so its not the same as the source im using?

Read full topic

item.title: How to add a bank
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

go to client.java and search for

makeGlobalObject

and somewhere between those objects add this

makeGlobalObject(3117, 9856, 468, 0, 10);

the

3117, 9856,

is your objects X and Y coords

the

468,

is your objects id

the 0 is the way your object is facing - [ S , N , W , E. ] ( [ 0 , 1 , 2 , 3 ] ) <---- not in the right order.

and 10… well… always leave it 10.

i believe a banks id for 317 is 2213

Read full topic
